certifications.title: All Ingredients Green Grade
certifications.desc: Formulated without harmful ingredients for sensitive skin

HomePage.faq_a1: SPIRUL365 is a moisturizing cream made with 67% rice bran water and directly cultivated spirulina. It's made only with ingredients, without pigments or fragrances.
HomePage.faq_q2: Can it be used on sensitive skin?
HomePage.faq_a2: Yes, it has completed hypoallergenic testing and is suitable for sensitive skin as it contains no pigments or fragrances.
HomePage.faq_q3: What are the benefits of spirulina?
HomePage.faq_a3: Spirulina contains over 60% protein and provides nutrition and moisture to the skin, giving it a healthy radiance.

AboutPage.subtitle: Brand Philosophy
AboutPage.hero_description:
We already live in a sufficiently complex world.

Your skincare should be simple and clear.
AboutPage.title: Care, Reconsidered. DAYZ
AboutPage.content_1:
ESONLAB DAYZ begins where conventional skincare often ends.

Not at recovery, but at what follows — the condition skin settles into, and how it continues to evolve with time.
AboutPage.content_2:
Grounded in Korean ingredients, we look beyond the familiar to discover lesser-known actives,

chosen not for recognition, but for their clarity of purpose and performance.

Rather than excess, we work with restraint — developing each formulation slowly and selectively,

with every ingredient serving a precise role.
AboutPage.content_3:
We believe certainty matters more than speed.

Guided by safety-first decisions and thoughtful design,

we create skincare intended to remain dependable — not only in the moment, but over time.
